infoPanel.description: Interactive map for finding where Chama has been!

body.p1: Haachama-chama~! This site tries to map the locations of posts with photos by "Akai Haato" from various prefectures across Japan. We aim to support fans in their <1>Seichi-junrei</1>, allowing them to explore and connect with the real-world locations featured in her content. You may also post your own photos using her fan-activity tag <3>#推し活はあとん日記</3>!
body.p2: This site displays geographic data and map tiles from third-party sources. By using this site, users agree to the following:
body.li1: The geographic labels shown on maps and in content are provided "as is" from third-party sources and may not reflect all viewpoints.
body.li2: Users are expected to engage respectfully and refrain from using the platform to promote political disputes or nationalistic rhetoric.
